name: Daniyal Khan
summary: Software Engineer with expertise in AI-driven applications, full-stack development (React.js, Django, REST APIs), and machine learning; experienced with algorithms for advanced manufacturing and agile workflows.

education.school: School of Computer Science, Information, and Engineering Technology
education.degree: Master of Computing and Information Systems

education.institution: Dr. APJ Abdul Kalam Technical University
education.degree: Bachelor of Technology, Computer Science and Engineering (Honors)

experience.title: Software Engineer
highlights: Developing AI-driven decision-making tools for manufacturing process selection using LangChain and agentic workflows.
Building full-stack applications with React.js, Django, REST APIs, and MySQL.
Implementing agile workflows to optimize software development.
Designing algorithms for parametric analysis in Laser Powder Bed Fusion (LPBF).

experience.title: Intern Software Developer
highlights: Developed point cloud data refinement and visualization tools for post-process monitoring in LPBF manufacturing.
Optimized SDLC and enhanced technical documentation of algorithms using JIRA.

experience.title: Graduate Research Assistant
experience.school_or_center: School of Computer Science, Information, and Engineering Technology
highlights: Conducted literature review on missing data imputation methods for time series.
Refined training models and data to optimize the imputation method.
Implemented and tested deep learning models using PyTorch and TensorFlow.

experience.company: The Rich Center for Autism (Youngstown State University)
experience.title: Student Assistant
highlights: Assisted students with Autism by adapting computing curriculum for ASD.
Collected behavior data related to curriculum changes and analyzed results.

experience.title: Intern Web Developer
highlights: Designed/developed UI and managed data flow using Vue.js for clearinghouses.
Built and maintained server-side functions, REST APIs, and databases using Java, Spring Boot, .NET Core, C#, and MySQL.
Worked with EHR/EMR and EDI documents per HIPAA transactions.

projects.name: Pneumonia Diagnosis Using Deep Learning
highlights: Built a TensorFlow model to diagnose pneumonia from X-ray images.
Deployed a Django REST API and Vue.js frontend for image-based predictions, achieving ~92% accuracy.

publications.title: Manufacturability Analysis of Laser Powder Bed Fusion using Machine Learning
A Comparative Study of Imputation Methods for Time Series Data
publications.venue: The Florida Artificial Intelligence Research Society

publications.title: Security Threats and Technologies on the Internet of Things Systems
publications.venue: International Journal for Scientific Research & Development
